categorization: Categorize this email into one of these categories: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do. To-Do emails must include a direct request requiring user action. Respond with only the category name.
action_extraction: Extract actionable tasks from this email. Respond in JSON format: { 'tasks': [ { 'task': 'task description', 'deadline': 'deadline if mentioned', 'priority': 'high/medium/low' } ] }
summarization: Provide a concise summary of this email focusing on key points and required actions.
auto_reply: Draft a polite and professional reply for this email. Keep it brief and actionable.
